mapper.sql: b.userId, b.title, b.description, b.imageName, b.image, b.classifyId, b.label, b.hit, b.comment, b.createTime, b.updateTime, b.status, b.isDelete, b.isTop
mapper.select: select id, name, password from user where id = #{id}

select b.id, u.name as userName, c.name as classify, b.content_md,
from blog b left join user u on b.userId = u.id left join classify c on b.classifyId = c.id where b.id = #{id} and b.isDelete = 0

select b.id, u.name as userName, c.name as classify,
from blog b left join user u on b.userId = u.id left join classify c on b.classifyId = c.id where isDelete = 0 order by id desc
select count(*) from blog where isDelete = 0
mapper.insert: insert into blog( userId, title, content_md, content_hm, description, imageName, image, classifyId, label, hit, comment, createTime, updateTime, status, isDelete, isTop ) values( #{userId}, #{title}, #{content_md}, #{content_hm}, #{description}, #{imageName}, #{image}, #{classifyId}, #{label}, #{hit}, #{comment}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{status}, #{isDelete}, #{isTop} )
mapper.update: update blog set imageName = "", image = "" where id = #{id}
